message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500.  It's a great deal and a fantastic opportunity for you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the opportunity, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your position. While I value our potential partnership,  $8,000 is unfortunately too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit more to $8,500.  This reflects the value I place on the product and your interest in it. Let's see if we can find common ground.
